00036 import gtk
00037 import cairo
00038 import pango
00039 import math

00043 ########################################################################
00044 # Math utilities.
00045 
00046 
00047 PI = math.pi
00048 TwoPI = 2.0 * PI
00049 
00050 Cos = math.cos
00051 Sin = math.sin
00052 Atan2 = math.atan2
00053 Sqrt = math.sqrt
00054 
00055 
00056 def Floor(val):
00057     return int(math.floor(val))
00058 
00059 def Ceil(val):
00060     return int(math.ceil(val))
00061 
00062 def Round(val):
00063     return Floor(val + 0.5)
00064 
00065 
00066 def DegToRad(deg):
00067     return (TwoPI * deg) / 360.0
00068 
00069 
00070 def RadToDeg(rad):
00071     return (360.0 * rad) / TwoPI
00072 
00073 
00074 def NormalizeAngleRad(ang):
00075 
00076     while ang < 0:
00077         ang += TwoPI
00078 
00079     while ang >= TwoPI:
00080         ang -= TwoPI
00081 
00082     return ang
00083 
00084 
00085 ########################################################################
00086 # Font cache.
00087 
00088 
00089 FontCache = {}
00090 
00091 def GetFont(s):
00092 
00093     if FontCache.has_key(s):
00094         return FontCache[s]
00095 
00096     descr = pango.FontDescription(s)
00097 
00098     FontCache[s] = descr
00099 
00100     return descr
00101 
00102 
00103 ########################################################################
00104 # Image cache.
00105 
00106 
00107 ImageCache = {}
00108 
00109 def GetImage(s):
00110    
00111     if ImageCache.has_key(s):
00112         return ImageCache[s]
00113    
00114     image = None
00115    
00116     if s[-4:].lower() == '.png':
00117         try:
00118             image = cairo.ImageSurface.create_from_png(s)
00119         except: pass
00120     elif s[-4:].lower() == '.svg':
00121         try:
00122             # FIXME: read SVG into image
00123             print "SVG images not supported yet:", s
00124         except: pass
00125     else:
00126         print "Don't know how to load image file type:", s
00127    
00128     if image:
00129         ImageCache[s] = image
00130    
00131     return image

00140     def __init__(
00141             self,
00142             label=None,
00143             description=None,
00144             action=None,
00145             x=0,
00146             y=0,
00147             width=0,
00148             height=0,
00149             labelFont='Sans 14',
00150             labelPadding=2,
00151             labelXAdjust=0,
00152             labelYAdjust=0,
00153             icon=None,
00154             iconHilite=None,
00155             iconPadding=2,
00156             iconSide='top',
00157             visible=True,
00158             pie=None,
00159             subPie=None,
00160             fixedRadius=0,
00161             linear=False,
00162             linearDirection='down',
00163             linearOrderReversed=False,
00164             linearGap=0,
00165             hiliteFillColor=(1, 1, 0),
00166             hiliteStrokeColor=(0, 0, 1),
00167             hiliteTextColor=(0, 0, 1),
00168             loliteFillColor=(1, 1, 1),
00169             loliteStrokeColor=(0, 0, 0),
00170             loliteTextColor=(0, 0, 0),
00171             **args):
00172 
00173         #print "PIEITEM INIT", self, label, args
00174         self.label = label
00175         self.description = description
00176         self.action = action
00177         self.x = x
00178         self.y = y
00179         self.width = width
00180         self.height = height
00181         self.labelFont = labelFont
00182         self.labelPadding = labelPadding
00183         self.labelXAdjust = labelXAdjust
00184         self.labelYAdjust = labelYAdjust
00185         self.icon = icon
00186         self.iconHilite = iconHilite
00187         self.iconPadding = iconPadding
00188         self.iconSide = iconSide
00189         self.visible = visible
00190         self.pie = None # Added later.
00191         self.subPie = subPie
00192         self.fixedRadius = fixedRadius
00193         self.linear = linear
00194         self.linearDirection = linearDirection
00195         self.linearOrderReversed = linearOrderReversed
00196         self.linearGap = linearGap
00197         self.hiliteFillColor = hiliteFillColor
00198         self.hiliteStrokeColor = hiliteStrokeColor
00199         self.hiliteTextColor = hiliteTextColor
00200         self.loliteFillColor = loliteFillColor
00201         self.loliteStrokeColor = loliteStrokeColor
00202         self.loliteTextColor = loliteTextColor
00203

00205         self.index = -1
00206         self.dx = 0
00207         self.dy = 0
00208         self.enterTime = 0

00210         self.totalTime = 0
00211         self.finalX = 0
00212         self.finalY = 0

00214         self.angle = 0

00216         self.edge1Dy = 0
00217         self.edge1Angle = 0
00218         self.edge2Dx = 0
00219         self.edge2Dy = 0
00220         self.edge2Angle = 0
00221         self.labelX = 0
00222         self.labelY = 0
00223         self.labelWidth = 0
00224         self.labelHeight = 0
00225         self.iconX = 0
00226         self.iconY = 0
00227         self.iconWidth = 0
00228         self.iconHeight = 0
00229 
00230         if pie != None:
00231             pie.addItem(self)

00234     def measure(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00235 
00236         label = self.label
00237 
00238         width = 0
00239         height = 0
00240 
00241         labelX = 0
00242         labelY = 0
00243         labelWidth = 0
00244         labelHeight = 0
00245 
00246         iconX = 0
00247         iconY = 0
00248         iconWidth = 0
00249         iconHeight = 0
00250 
00251         labelPadding = self.labelPadding
00252         iconPadding = self.iconPadding
00253 
00254         if label != None:
00255 
00256             font = GetFont(self.labelFont)
00257 
00258             playout.set_font_description(font)
00259             playout.set_markup(label)
00260             labelWidth, labelHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00261 
00262             labelWidth += 2 * labelPadding
00263             labelHeight += 2 * labelPadding
00264 
00265         icon = self.icon
00266 
00267         if icon != None:
00268 
00269             image = GetImage(icon)
00270             if image:
00271 
00272                 iconWidth = image.get_width()
00273                 iconHeight = image.get_height()
00274 
00275                 iconWidth += 2 * iconPadding
00276                 iconHeight += 2 * iconPadding
00277 
00278         if not label:
00279             if not icon:
00280                 # No icon, no label.
00281                 pass
00282             else:
00283                 # Just an icon.
00284                 width = iconWidth
00285                 height = iconHeight
00286                 iconX = iconPadding
00287                 iconY = iconPadding
00288         else:
00289             if not icon:
00290                 # Just a label.
00291                 width = labelWidth
00292                 height = labelHeight
00293                 labelX = labelPadding
00294                 labelY = labelPadding
00295             else:
00296                 # Icon and label.
00297                 iconSide = self.iconSide
00298                 if iconSide in ('n', 'up', 'top'):
00299                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00300                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00301                     iconX = Floor(((width - iconWidth) / 2) + iconPadding)
00302                     iconY = iconPadding
00303                     labelX = Floor(((width - labelWidth) / 2) + labelPadding)
00304                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00305                 elif iconSide in ('nw', 'topleft'):
00306                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00307                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00308                     iconX = iconPadding
00309                     iconY = iconPadding
00310                     labelX = labelPadding
00311                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00312                 elif iconSide in ('ne', 'topright'):
00313                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00314                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00315                     iconX = width - iconWidth + iconPadding
00316                     iconY = iconPadding
00317                     labelX = width - labelWidth + labelPadding
00318                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00319                 elif iconSide in ('s', 'down', 'bottom'):
00320                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00321                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00322                     labelX = Floor(((width - labelWidth) / 2) + labelPadding)
00323                     labelY = labelPadding
00324                     iconX = Floor(((width - iconWidth) / 2) + iconPadding)
00325                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00326                 elif iconSide in ('sw', 'bottomleft'):
00327                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00328                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00329                     labelX = labelPadding
00330                     labelY = labelPadding
00331                     iconX = iconPadding
00332                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00333                 elif iconSide in ('se', 'bottomright'):
00334                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00335                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00336                     labelX = width - labelWidth + labelPadding
00337                     labelY = labelPadding
00338                     iconX = width - iconWidth + iconPadding
00339                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00340                 elif iconSide in ('w', 'left'):
00341                     width = labelWidth + iconWidth
00342                     height = max(labelHeight, iconHeight)
00343                     iconX = iconPadding
00344                     iconY = Floor(((height - iconHeight) / 2) + iconPadding)
00345                     labelX = iconWidth + labelPadding
00346                     labelY = Floor(((height - labelHeight) / 2) + labelPadding)
00347                 elif iconSide in ('e', 'right'):
00348                     width = labelWidth + iconWidth
00349                     height = max(labelHeight, iconHeight)
00350                     labelX = labelPadding
00351                     labelY = Floor(((height - labelHeight) / 2) + labelPadding)
00352                     iconX = labelWidth + iconPadding
00353                     iconY = Floor(((height - iconHeight) / 2) + iconPadding)
00354                 else:
00355                     print "Invalid iconSide: " + repr(iconSide)
00356 
00357         self.width = width
00358         self.height = height
00359 
00360         labelX += self.labelXAdjust
00361         labelY += self.labelYAdjust
00362 
00363         self.labelX = labelX
00364         self.labelY = labelY
00365         self.labelWidth = labelWidth
00366         self.labelHeight = labelHeight
00367 
00368         self.iconX = iconX
00369         self.iconY = iconY
00370         self.iconWidth = iconWidth
00371         self.iconHeight = iconHeight
00372 
00373 
00374     def layoutPie(self, radius):
00375 
00376         if self.fixedRadius > 0:
00377             radius = self.fixedRadius;
00378 
00379         gap = 1
00380         rdx = radius * self.dx
00381         rdy = radius * self.dy
00382 
00383         # Special cases for top, bottom, left, and right
00384         if Round(rdx) == 0: # top or bottom
00385             rdx -= (self.width / 2.0) + 1
00386             if rdy > 0:
00387                 rdy += gap - 3; # top
00388             else:
00389                 rdy -= self.height + gap - 2; # bottom
00390         else:
00391             if Round(rdy) == 0: # left or right
00392                 rdy -= (self.height / 2.0) + 0.5
00393                 if rdx < 0:
00394                     rdx -= self.width + gap - 2
00395                 else:
00396                     rdx += gap - 3
00397             else: # everwhere else
00398                 # Justify the label according to its quadrant.
00399                 fudge = 2
00400 
00401                 if rdx < 0:
00402                     rdx -= self.width - fudge
00403                 else:
00404                     rdx -= fudge
00405 
00406                 if rdy < 0:
00407                     rdy -= self.height - fudge
00408                 else:
00409                     rdy -= fudge
00410 
00411         self.x = Round(rdx)
00412         self.y = Round(rdy)
00413 
00414 
00415     def layoutLinear(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
00416         pie = self.pie
00417 
00418         linearDirection = self.linearDirection
00419         if ((linearDirection == None) or
00420             (linearDirection == "")):
00421             linearDirection = self.pie.linearDirection
00422 
00423         pie = self.pie
00424         gap = self.linearGap
00425         xCenterOffset = 0
00426         yCenterOffset = 0
00427 
00428         if linearDirection in ('c', 'center'):
00429             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 'center')
00430             xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1) # TODO: Explain what this -1 fudge is for!
00431             yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00432         elif linearDirection in ('e', 'right'):
00433             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 0)
00434             if otherItem:
00435                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00436                 yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00437             else:
00438                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00439                 return
00440         elif linearDirection in ('ne', 'topright'):
00441             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 45)
00442             if otherItem:
00443                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00444                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y + otherItem.height - self.height)
00445             else:
00446                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00447                 return
00448         elif linearDirection in ('se', 'bottomright'):
00449             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 315)
00450             if otherItem:
00451                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00452                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y)
00453             else:
00454                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00455                 return
00456         elif linearDirection in ('w', 'left'):
00457             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 180)
00458             if otherItem:
00459                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - self.width - gap)
00460                 yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00461             else:
00462                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00463                 return
00464         elif linearDirection in ('nw', 'topleft'):
00465             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 135)
00466             if otherItem:
00467                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - otherItem.width - gap)
00468                 yCenterOffset = Floor((otherItem.y + otherItem.height - self.height))
00469             else:
00470                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00471                 return
00472         elif linearDirection in ('sw', 'bottomleft'):
00473             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 225)
00474             if otherItem:
00475                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - self.width - gap)
00476                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y)
00477             else:
00478                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00479                 return
00480         elif linearDirection in ('n', 'up', 'top'):
00481             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 90)
00482             if otherItem:
00483                 xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1)
00484                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y - self.height - gap)
00485             else:
00486                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00487                 return
00488         elif linearDirection in ('s', 'down', 'bottom'):
00489             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 270)
00490             if otherItem:
00491                 xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1)
00492                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y + otherItem.height + gap)
00493             else:
00494                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00495                 return
00496 
00497         self.x = Round(xCenterOffset)
00498         self.y = Round(yCenterOffset)
00499 
00500         self.ringIndex = None
00501 
00502 
00503     def itemsOverlap(self, item, fringe=2):
00504 
00505         myLeft = self.x - fringe
00506         myRight = self.x + self.width + fringe
00507         yourLeft = item.x - fringe
00508         yourRight = item.x + item.width + fringe
00509         myTop = self.y - fringe
00510         myBottom = self.y + self.height + fringe
00511         yourTop = item.y - fringe
00512         yourBottom = item.y + item.height + fringe
00513 
00514         return ((myBottom > yourTop) and
00515                 (myTop < yourBottom) and
00516                 (myRight > yourLeft) and
00517                 (myLeft < yourRight))
00518 
00519 
00520     def draw(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00521 
00522         x = self.x
00523         y = self.y
00524         width = self.width
00525         height = self.height
00526 
00527         hilited = self.index == self.pie.curItem
00528 
00529         if hilited:
00530             fillColor = self.hiliteFillColor
00531             strokeColor = self.hiliteStrokeColor
00532             textColor = self.hiliteTextColor
00533         else:
00534             fillColor = self.loliteFillColor
00535             strokeColor = self.loliteStrokeColor
00536             textColor = self.loliteTextColor
00537 
00538         if fillColor or strokeColor:
00539 
00540             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
00541 
00542             if fillColor:
00543                 context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
00544                 if strokeColor:
00545                     context.fill_preserve()
00546                 else:
00547                     context.fill()
00548 
00549             if strokeColor:
00550                 context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
00551                 context.stroke()
00552 
00553         label = self.label
00554         if textColor and (label != None):
00555 
00556             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
00557 
00558             font = GetFont(self.labelFont)
00559 
00560             playout.set_font_description(font)
00561             playout.set_markup(label)
00562 
00563             context.move_to(
00564                 x + self.labelX,
00565                 y + self.labelY)
00566 
00567             context.show_layout(playout)
00568 
00569         hilited = self.index == self.pie.curItem
00570         if hilited:
00571             icon = self.iconHilite or self.icon
00572         else:
00573             icon = self.icon
00574 
00575         if icon:
00576 
00577             image = GetImage(icon)
00578             if image:
00579 
00580                 context.set_source_surface(
00581                     image,
00582                     x + self.iconX,
00583                     y + self.iconY)
00584 
00585                 context.paint()
00586

00734         self.footerFillColor = footerFillColor
00735         self.footerStrokeColor = footerStrokeColor
00736         self.footerTextColor = footerTextColor
00737         self.footerFont = footerFont
00738         self.footerPadding = footerPadding
00739         self.footerMargin = footerMargin
00740         self.footerGap = footerGap
00741         self.footerXAdjust = footerXAdjust
00742         self.footerYAdjust = footerYAdjust
00743         self.footerFixedHeight = footerFixedHeight
00744         self.footerDescriptions = footerDescriptions
00745         self.clockwise = clockwise
00746         self.initialAngle = initialAngle
00747         self.fixedRadius = fixedRadius
00748         self.minRadius = minRadius
00749         self.maxRadius = maxRadius
00750         self.extraRadius = extraRadius
00751         self.labelGapRadius = labelGapRadius
00752         self.marginRadius = marginRadius
00753         self.radiusNotch = radiusNotch
00754         self.showBackground = showBackground
00755         self.backgroundImage = backgroundImage
00756         self.border = border
00757         self.overlapFringe = overlapFringe
00758         self.maxPieItems = maxPieItems
00759         self.pieSlice = pieSlice
00760         self.linear = linear
00761         self.linearDirection = linearDirection
00762         self.linearOrderReversed = linearOrderReversed
00763         self.transparentItems = transparentItems
00764         self.itemBorder = itemBorder
00765         self.itemMargin = itemMargin
00766         self.itemWidth = itemWidth
00767         self.itemHeight = itemHeight
00768         self.centerMargin = centerMargin
00769         self.centerBorderWidth = centerBorderWidth
00770         self.centerVisible = centerVisible
00771         self.parentPie = parentPie
00772         self.parentItem = parentItem
00773 
00774         self.radius = 0
00775         self.centerX = 0
00776         self.centerY = 0
00777         self.innerRadius = 0
00778         self.headerX = 0
00779         self.headerY = 0
00780         self.headerWidth = 0
00781         self.headerHeight = 0
00782         self.footerX = 0
00783         self.footerY = 0
00784         self.footerWidth = 0
00785         self.footerHeight = 0
00786         self.curX = -1
00787         self.curY = -1
00788         self.lastX = -1
00789         self.lastY = -1
00790         self.mouseDeltaX = 0
00791         self.mouseDeltaY = 0
00792         self.direction = 0
00793         self.distance = 0
00794         self.items = []
00795         self.visibleItems = []
00796         self.pieRings = []
00797         self.pieItems = []
00798         self.linearItems = []
00799         self.itemDirections = {}
00800         self.item = None
00801         self.curRingIndex = 0
00802         self.curItem = -1
00803         self.lastItem = -1
00804         self.valid = False
00805         self.minX = 0
00806         self.maxX = 0
00807         self.minY = 0
00808         self.maxY = 0
00809         self.trackingFlag = False
00810         self.centerX = 0
00811         self.centerY = 0
00812         self.pinned = False
00813         self.winX = 0
00814         self.winY = 0
00815         self.winWidth = 1
00816         self.winHeight = 1
00817         self.x = 0
00818         self.y = 0
00819         self.width = 1
00820         self.height = 1
00821 
00822         d = PieMenuDrawingArea()
00823         self.d = d
00824         self.add(self.d)
00825 
00826         self.connect("show", self.handleShow)
00827 
00828         d.connect("expose_event", self.handleExpose)
00829         d.connect("size_allocate", self.handleSizeAllocate)
00830         d.connect("motion_notify_event", self.handleMotionNotifyEvent)
00831         d.connect("button_press_event", self.handleButtonPressEvent)
00832         d.connect("button_release_event", self.handleButtonReleaseEvent)
00833         d.connect("proximity_in_event", self.handleProximityInEvent)
00834         d.connect("proximity_out_event", self.handleProximityOutEvent)
00835         d.connect("grab_notify", self.handleGrabNotify)
00836         d.connect("grab_broken_event", self.handleGrabBrokenEvent)
00837         d.connect("key_press_event", self.handleKeyPressEvent)
00838         d.connect("key_release_event", self.handleKeyReleaseEvent)
00839 
00840         d.set_events(
00841             gtk.gdk.EXPOSURE_MASK |
00842             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_MASK |
00843             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_HINT_MASK |
00844             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_MOTION_MASK |

00846             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK |
00847             gtk.gdk.KEY_PRESS_MASK |

00850             gtk.gdk.PROXIMITY_OUT_MASK)

00853     def addItem(self, item):
00854 
00855         item.pie = self
00856         self.items.append(item)
00857         self.invalidate()
00858 
00859 
00860     def invalidate(self):
00861 
00862         self.valid = False
00863 
00864 
00865     def validate(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00866 
00867         print "VALIDATE", self.valid
00868 
00869         if self.valid:
00870             return
00871 
00872         self.valid = True
00873 
00874         self.layout(context, pcontext, playout)
00875 
00876 
00877     def addItemDirection(self, item, deg):
00878 
00879         # Add an item to the map of directions to items in that direction.
00880         # Also set the item's dx and dy. Not sure why that's here.
00881 
00882         if deg == "center":
00883             dx = 0
00884             dy = 0
00885         else:
00886             angle = DegToRad(deg)
00887             deg = Round(RadToDeg(NormalizeAngleRad(angle)))
00888             dx = Cos(angle)
00889             dy = -Sin(angle)
00890 
00891         item.dx = dx
00892         item.dy = dy
00893 
00894         lastItem = None
00895 
00896         a = self.itemDirections.get(deg, None)
00897         if not a:
00898             a = []
00899             self.itemDirections[deg] = a
00900         else:
00901             lastItem = a[-1]
00902 
00903         a.append(item)
00904 
00905         return lastItem
00906 
00907 
00908     def layout(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00909 
00910         print "PieMenu layout", self, context, pcontext, playout
00911 
00912         # Just the visible items.
00913         visibleItems = []
00914         self.visibleItems = visibleItems
00915 
00916         # The pie rings.
00917         pieRings = []
00918         self.pieRings = pieRings
00919 
00920         # Just the visible pie menus items.
00921         pieItems = []
00922         self.pieItems = pieItems
00923 
00924         # Just the visible linear menu items.
00925         linearItems = []
00926         self.linearItems = linearItems
00927 
00928         # Map of item direction to array of items in that direction.
00929         # Note: Think about how this interacts with rings and linear menu items.
00930         itemDirections = {}
00931         self.itemDirections = itemDirections
00932 
00933         # Put just the visible items from items into the visibleItems array.
00934         visibleItems = [
00935             item
00936             for item in self.items
00937             if item.visible
00938         ]
00939         self.visibleItems = visibleItems
00940 
00941         # Count the visible items.
00942         itemCount = len(visibleItems)
00943 
00944         # We're done if no items.
00945         if itemCount == 0:
00946             return
00947 
00948         # Initialize constants and variables for layout.
00949 
00950         overlapFringe = self.overlapFringe
00951         pieSlice = self.pieSlice
00952 
00953         maxPieItems = self.maxPieItems
00954         if maxPieItems == None:
00955             maxPieItems = [1.0e+6]
00956         elif type(maxPieItems) not in (type(()), type([])):
00957             maxPieItems = [maxPieItems]
00958 
00959         maxPieItemsTotal = 0
00960         for i in maxPieItems:
00961             maxPieItemsTotal += i
00962 
00963         # Categorize items into pieItems and linearItems arrays.
00964         itemIndex = 0
00965         pieItemCount = 0
00966         maxRingItems = maxPieItems[0]
00967         for item in visibleItems:
00968 
00969           item.index = itemIndex
00970           itemIndex += 1
00971           item.valid = False
00972 
00973           # Limit the number of pie items to maxPieItemsTotal.
00974           # Classify overflow items as linear.
00975           if pieItemCount >= maxPieItemsTotal:
00976               item.linear = True
00977 
00978           if item.linear:
00979               # Handle reverse ordering linear items.
00980               if item.linearOrderReversed:
00981                   # Prepend the linear item to the beginning of the linearItems array.
00982                   linearItems.insert(0, item)
00983               else:
00984                   # Append the linear item to the end of the linearItems array.
00985                   linearItems.append(item)
00986           else:
00987               # If this is the first item, then make the first ring.
00988               if len(pieRings) == 0:
00989                   pieRings.append(pieItems)
00990 
00991               # If this item will overflow the current ring, then make a new ring.
00992               if len(pieItems) >= maxRingItems:
00993                   pieItems = []
00994                   pieRings.append(pieItems)
00995                   ringIndex = len(pieRings) - 1
00996                   if ringIndex < len(maxPieItems):
00997                       maxRingItems = maxPieItems[ringIndex]
00998                   else:
00999                       print "Layout error: too many pie items, maxPieItems array did not add up right."
01000 
01001               # Append the pie item to the end of the pieItems array.
01002               pieItems.append(item)
01003               pieItemCount += 1
01004 
01005         # Measure the items.
01006         for item in self.items:
01007             item.x = 0
01008             item.y = 0
01009             item.measure(context, pcontext, playout)
01010 
01011         ringCount = len(pieRings)
01012         linearItemCount = len(linearItems)
01013 
01014         # If there are any pie items, then calculate the pie menu parameters.
01015         if ringCount > 0:
01016 
01017             pieSubtend = TwoPI
01018             if pieSlice:
01019                 pieSubtend *= pieSlice
01020 
01021             ringIndex = 0
01022             for ringItems in pieRings:
01023 
01024                 ringItemCount = len(ringItems)
01025 
01026                 # Calculate the subtend, angle, cosine, sine, quadrant, slope,
01027                 # and size of each pie menu item.
01028 
01029                 # Calculate twist, the angular width of each slice.
01030                 twist = pieSubtend / ringItemCount
01031 
01032                 # Twist the other way if clockwise.
01033                 ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(ringIndex)
01034                 if ringClockwise:
01035                     twist = -twist
01036 
01037                 # Point ang towards the center of the first slice,
01038                 # or the edge of the first slice, for non-zero pieSlice.
01039 
01040                 ringInitialAngle = self.getRingInitialAngle(ringIndex)
01041                 ang = DegToRad(ringInitialAngle)
01042 
01043                 if pieSlice == 0:
01044                     # Twist backwards half a slice, to the edge of the slice.
01045                     ang -= twist / 2.0
01046 
01047                 # Now calculate the size and other properties of the pie items.
01048                 for item in ringItems:
01049 
01050                     # Calculate angle, the center of the current slice.
01051                     angle = ang + (twist / 2.0)
01052 
01053                     # Add self item to the piemenu's list of items in the same direction.
01054                     self.addItemDirection(item, RadToDeg(angle))
01055 
01056                     # Calculate the unit vectors of the slice edge directions.
01057                     # Calculate ang in the upside-down coordinate system, for drawing.
01058                     item.ringIndex = ringIndex
01059                     item.angle = ang
01060                     item.edge1Dx = Cos(ang)
01061                     item.edge1Dy = -Sin(ang)
01062                     item.edge1Angle = Atan2(item.edge1Dy, item.edge1Dx)
01063                     item.edge2Dx = Cos(ang + twist)
01064                     item.edge2Dy = -Sin(ang + twist)
01065                     item.edge2Angle = Atan2(item.edge2Dy, item.edge2Dx)
01066 
01067                     # Twist ang around to the edge of the next slice.
01068                     ang += twist
01069 
01070                 ringIndex += 1
01071 
01072         # Determine the radius for the inner ring.
01073         fixedRadius = self.fixedRadius
01074 
01075         labelGapRadius = self.labelGapRadius
01076 
01077         # If the radius is not fixed, then calculate it dynamically.
01078         if fixedRadius > 0:
01079 
01080             # Use the fixed radius that has been specified.
01081             radius = fixedRadius
01082            
01083         else:
01084 
01085             # Start with the minRadius.
01086             radius = self.minRadius
01087 
01088             # If there are any pie items, then make sure they don't overlap.
01089             if ringCount > 0:
01090 
01091                 # Only apply this to the inner ring of the pie menu, for now.
01092                 # The outer rings will each be a fixed ringRadius thick.
01093                 # I think it's better to have explicit control over the
01094                 # inner fixedRadius and outer ringRadius, so designers can
01095                 # tune it to be easy to use, instead of leaving it up to the
01096                 # label layout algorithm to determine (which could badly effect usability).
01097                 # Otherwise pie menus would be too big and the ring sizes would be irregular.
01098                 # Could implement an array of ringRadius numbers to explicitly control
01099                 # the radius of each ring, but that seems control-freakish, so not yet.
01100 
01101                 ringItems = pieRings[0]
01102 
01103                 # Increase the radius until there are no overlaps between
01104                 # any pie items.
01105                 # Start by wrapping last around to the end of the
01106                 # circular menu.
01107 
01108                 # Last index and last pie item, used to test for overlap.
01109                 # Only test for last item overlap if more than one pie item.
01110                 lastIndex = len(ringItems) - 1
01111                 last = None
01112                 if lastIndex > 0:
01113                     last = ringItems[lastIndex]
01114 
01115                 # Loop over all pie items testing for overlap with last adjacent
01116                 # pie item.
01117                 for item in ringItems:
01118 
01119                     # Ignore fixedRadius items.
01120                     # XXX: The behavior of mixing adjacent fixedRadius and not
01121                     # fixedRadius pie menu items is not well defined.
01122                     # XXX: fixedRadius should be inherited from the piemenu.
01123                     if item.fixedRadius > 0:
01124                         continue
01125 
01126                     # Push the radius out until there are no overlaps.
01127                     # Give up after a while.
01128                     maxLoops = 200
01129                     radiusNotch = self.radiusNotch
01130 
01131                     for loopCount in range(maxLoops):
01132 
01133                         # Lay out the item at the current radius.
01134                         item.layoutPie(radius + labelGapRadius)
01135 
01136                         # If there is only one item, then we're done pushing out.
01137                         if last == None:
01138                             # Done pushing out.
01139                             break
01140 
01141                         # If there are more than one pie items, then test for adjacent overlaps.
01142                         # Lay out the last item at the current radius.
01143                         last.layoutPie(radius + labelGapRadius)
01144 
01145                         # Test for overlap. Takes two to tango.
01146                         if not item.itemsOverlap(last, overlapFringe):
01147                             # They don't overlap, so we're done pushing out.
01148                             break
01149 
01150                         # The two adjacent labels overlap, so we keep looping and
01151                         # pushing them out until they don't.
01152 
01153                         # Bump the radiusNotch.
01154                         radius += radiusNotch
01155 
01156                     last = item
01157 
01158             # Add in the extra radius.
01159             radius += self.extraRadius
01160 
01161         # Done calculating the radius.
01162         self.radius = radius
01163 
01164         ringRadius = self.ringRadius
01165         outerRingRadius = radius + ((len(pieRings) - 1) * ringRadius)
01166 
01167         # Calculate the bounding box of the items, as we lay them out.
01168         maxX = -1000000
01169         minX = 1000000
01170         maxY = -1000000
01171         minY = 1000000
01172 
01173         if ringCount > 0:
01174             # If there are any pie items, then make sure the bounding box
01175             # encompasses the radius.
01176             minX = -outerRingRadius
01177             minY = -outerRingRadius
01178             maxX = outerRingRadius
01179             maxY = outerRingRadius
01180 
01181         # Calculate the maximum radius (squared).
01182         maxRadius = 0
01183 
01184         # Loop over the pie items, and calculate their bounding box
01185         # and maxRadius.
01186 
01187         ringIndex = 0
01188         for ringItems in pieRings:
01189            
01190             for item in ringItems:
01191 
01192                 # Lay out the pie item at the current radius.
01193                 item.layoutPie(
01194                     radius + (ringIndex * ringRadius) + labelGapRadius)
01195 
01196                 # Calculate the corners of the item bounding box.
01197                 itw = item.width
01198                 ith = item.height
01199                 itx0 = item.x
01200                 ity0 = item.y
01201                 itx1 = itx0 + itw
01202                 ity1 = ity0 + ith
01203 
01204                 # Update the bounding box.
01205                 if itx0 < minX:
01206                     minX = itx0
01207                 if ity0 < minY:
01208                     minY = ity0
01209                 if itx1 > maxX:
01210                     maxX = itx1
01211                 if ity1 > maxY:
01212                     maxY = ity1
01213 
01214                 # Update the maxRadius.
01215                 farx = max(abs(itx0), abs(itx1))
01216                 fary = max(abs(ity0), abs(ity1))
01217                 rad = (farx * farx) + (fary * fary)
01218 
01219                 if rad > self.maxRadius:
01220                     maxRadius = rad;
01221 
01222             ringIndex += 1
01223 
01224         # Loop over the linear items, lay them out,
01225         # and calculate their bounding box and maxRadius.
01226 
01227         # Calculate the max width of the north and south linear items.
01228         maxItemWidthNorth = 0
01229         maxItemWidthSouth = 0
01230 
01231         for item in linearItems:
01232           # Lay out the linear item.
01233           item.layoutLinear(
01234               minX,
01235               minY,
01236               maxX,
01237               maxY)
01238 
01239           # Calculate the max vertical item width.
01240           if abs(item.dx) < 0.01:
01241               if item.dy < 0:
01242                   if item.width > maxItemWidthNorth:
01243                       maxItemWidthNorth = item.width
01244                       #print "maxItemWidthNorth", maxItemWidthNorth
01245               else:
01246                   if item.width > maxItemWidthSouth:
01247                       maxItemWidthSouth = item.width
01248                       #print "maxItemWidthSouth", maxItemWidthSouth
01249 
01250           # Calculate the corners of the item bounding box.
01251           itw = item.width
01252           ith = item.height
01253           itx0 = item.x
01254           ity0 = item.y
01255           itx1 = itx0 + itw
01256           ity1 = ity0 + ith
01257 
01258           # Update the bounding box.
01259           if itx0 < minX:
01260               minX = itx0
01261           if ity0 < minY:
01262               minY = ity0
01263           if itx1 > maxX:
01264               maxX = itx1
01265           if ity1 > maxY:
01266               maxY = ity1
01267 
01268           # Update the maxRadius.
01269           farx = max(abs(itx0), abs(itx1))
01270           fary = max(abs(ity0), abs(ity1))
01271           rad = (farx * farx) + (fary * fary)
01272           if rad > maxRadius:
01273               maxRadius = rad;
01274 
01275         # Go over the linear items and fix the x and width of all vertical items.
01276         for item in linearItems:
01277           #print "item.dx", item.dx, item
01278           if abs(item.dx) < 0.01:
01279               w = 0
01280               if item.dy < 0:
01281                   w = maxItemWidthNorth
01282               else:
01283                   w = maxItemWidthSouth
01284 
01285               item.width = w
01286               item.x = Round((-0.5 * w) - 1)
01287 
01288         # Calculate the maxRadius.
01289         maxRadius = Floor(
01290             0.95 +
01291             Sqrt(maxRadius) +
01292             self.marginRadius)
01293         self.maxRadius = maxRadius
01294 
01295         # Expand the bounding box by the border.
01296         border = self.border
01297         minX -= border
01298         minY -= border
01299         maxX += border
01300         maxY += border
01301 
01302         # Expand the bounding box to integers.
01303         minX = Floor(minX)
01304         minY = Floor(minY)
01305         maxX = Ceil(maxX)
01306         maxY = Ceil(maxY)
01307 
01308         # Measure and position the header.
01309         self.measureHeader(context, pcontext, playout)
01310         (minX, minY, maxX, maxY) = self.positionHeader(minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01311 
01312         # Measure and position the footer.
01313         self.measureFooter(context, pcontext, playout)
01314         (minX, minY, maxX, maxY) = self.positionFooter(minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01315 
01316         # Done calculating the bounding box.
01317         self.minX = minX
01318         self.minY = minY
01319         self.maxX = maxX
01320         self.maxY = maxY
01321 
01322         # Set the pie menu center.
01323         centerX = Round(-minX)
01324         centerY = Round(-minY)
01325         self.centerX = centerX
01326         self.centerY = centerY
01327 
01328         # Set the window position and size.
01329 
01330         width = maxX - minX
01331         height = maxY - minY
01332 
01333         if self.pieRings:
01334             # If it's a pie menu, then center in the middle of the menu.
01335             x = self.pinX + minX
01336             y = self.pinY + minY
01337         else:
01338             # If it's a linear menu, then center on its header, or just below the mouse if no header.
01339             x = self.pinX - (width / 2)
01340             y = self.pinY - (self.headerHeight / 2)
01341 
01342         self.x = x
01343         self.y = y
01344         self.width = width
01345         self.height =  height
01346 
01347         # Offset the header.
01348         self.headerX -= minX
01349         self.headerY -= minY
01350 
01351         # Offset the footer.
01352         self.footerX -= minX
01353         self.footerY -= minY
01354 
01355         # Offset the items.
01356         for item in visibleItems:
01357 
01358             x = item.x
01359             y = item.y
01360             x -= minX
01361             y -= minY
01362 
01363             item.x = x
01364             item.y = y
01365             item.finalX = x
01366             item.finalY = y
01367 
01368         # Done laying out the pie menu. (Whew!)
01369 
01370         # FIXME: Just do this after popup?
01371         print "AFTER LAYOUT", "WIDTH", self.width, "HEIGHT", self.height
01372         self.setWindowShape()
01373 
01374 
01375     def getRingClockwise(self, ring=0):
01376         clockwise = self.clockwise
01377         if type(clockwise) not in (type(()), type([])):
01378             clockwise = [clockwise]
01379         return clockwise[min(ring, len(clockwise) - 1)]
01380 
01381 
01382     def getRingInitialAngle(self, ring=0):
01383         initialAngle = self.initialAngle
01384         if type(initialAngle) not in (type(()), type([])):
01385             initialAngle = [initialAngle]
01386         return initialAngle[min(ring, len(initialAngle) - 1)]
01387 
01388 
01389     def measureHeader(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01390 
01391         header = self.header
01392 
01393         if header == None:
01394             self.headerWidth = 0
01395             self.headerHeight = 0
01396             return
01397 
01398         font = GetFont(self.headerFont)
01399 
01400         playout.set_font_description(font)
01401         playout.set_markup(header)
01402         width, height = playout.get_pixel_size()
01403 
01404         headerPadding = self.headerPadding
01405         width += 2 * headerPadding
01406         height += 2 * headerPadding
01407 
01408         self.headerWidth = width
01409         self.headerHeight = height
01410 
01411 
01412     def positionHeader(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
01413 
01414         if self.header == None:
01415             headerX = 0
01416             headerY = 0
01417         else:
01418 
01419             headerWidth = self.headerWidth
01420             headerHeight = self.headerHeight
01421             headerMargin = self.headerMargin
01422 
01423             # Position the header horizontally.
01424             headerX = Floor(headerWidth / -2)
01425 
01426             # Make vertical space above the bounding box for the header.
01427             headerY = minY - headerHeight - self.headerGap
01428 
01429             minX = Floor(min(minX, headerX - headerMargin))
01430             maxX = Ceil(max(maxX, headerX + headerWidth + headerMargin))
01431 
01432             minY = Floor(min(minY, headerY - headerMargin))
01433             maxY = Ceil(max(maxY, headerY + headerHeight + headerMargin))
01434 
01435         self.headerX = headerX
01436         self.headerY = headerY
01437 
01438         return (minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01439 
01440 
01441     def measureFooter(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01442 
01443         # @todo Measure self.neutralDescription and each item.description to find the largest.
01444         # @todo Set the footer width to the width of the window, and center the text.
01445 
01446         footer = self.footer
01447         footerFixedHeight = self.footerFixedHeight
01448 
01449         if (footer == None) and (footerFixedHeight > 0):
01450             self.footerWidth = 0
01451             self.footerHeight = 0
01452             return
01453 
01454         if not footer:
01455             footer = ''
01456 
01457         font = GetFont(self.footerFont)
01458 
01459         playout.set_font_description(font)
01460         playout.set_markup(footer)
01461         width, height = playout.get_pixel_size()
01462 
01463         footerPadding = self.footerPadding
01464         width += 2 * footerPadding
01465         height += 2 * footerPadding
01466 
01467         if footerFixedHeight > 0:
01468             height = footerFixedHeight
01469 
01470         self.footerWidth = width
01471         self.footerHeight = height
01472 
01473 
01474     def positionFooter(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
01475 
01476         if self.footer == None:
01477             footerX = 0
01478             footerY = 0
01479         else:
01480 
01481             footerWidth = self.footerWidth
01482             footerHeight = self.footerHeight
01483             footerMargin = self.footerMargin
01484 
01485             # Position the footer horizontally.
01486             footerX = Floor(footerWidth / -2)
01487 
01488             # Make vertical space above the bounding box for the footer.
01489             footerY = maxY + self.footerGap
01490 
01491             minX = Floor(min(minX, footerX - footerMargin))
01492             maxX = Ceil(max(maxX, footerX + footerWidth + footerMargin))
01493 
01494             minY = Floor(min(minY, footerY - footerMargin))
01495             maxY = Ceil(max(maxY, footerY + footerHeight + footerMargin))
01496 
01497             # If (always or) fixed height footer, then expand it out horizontally.
01498             #if True or self.footerFixedHeight:
01499             #    footerWidth = maxX - minX
01500             #    self.footerWidth = footerWidth
01501 
01502         self.footerX = footerX
01503         self.footerY = footerY
01504 
01505         return (minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01506 
01507 
01508     def setWindowShape(self):
01509 
01510         #print "SETWINDOWSHAPE", self.x, self.y, self.width, self.height
01511         x = int(self.x)
01512         y = int(self.y)
01513         width = int(self.width)
01514         height = int(self.height)
01515 
01516         if ((x != self.winX) or
01517             (y != self.winY)):
01518             self.changePosition(x, y)
01519 
01520         if ((width != self.winWidth) or
01521             (height != self.winHeight)):
01522             self.changeSize(width, height)
01523 
01524 
01525     def changePosition(self, x, y):
01526 
01527         x = int(x)
01528         y = int(y)
01529 
01530         self.winX = x
01531         self.winY = y
01532 
01533         self.move(x, y)
01534 
01535 
01536     def changeSize(self, width, height):
01537 
01538         print "CHANGESIZE", width, height
01539 
01540         width = int(width)
01541         height = int(height)
01542 
01543         self.winWidth = width
01544         self.winHeight = height
01545 
01546         self.resize(width, height)
01547 
01548 
01549     def popUp(self, pinX, pinY, pinned=False):
01550 
01551         self.pinX = Floor(pinX + 0.5)
01552         self.pinY = Floor(pinY + 0.5)
01553         self.pinned = pinned
01554 
01555         self.curItem = -1
01556         self.curRingIndex = 0
01557         self.item = None
01558 
01559         if self.footerDescriptions:
01560             self.footer = self.neutralDescription
01561 
01562         self.invalidate()
01563         self.setWindowShape()
01564         self.redraw()
01565        
01566         self.show_all()
01567 
01568         d = self.d
01569        
01570         d.grab_add()
01571         d.grab_focus()
01572 
01573         #print "W", self.window
01574 
01575         print "POINTER_GRAB"
01576         gtk.gdk.pointer_grab(
01577             d.window,
01578             True,
01579             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_PRESS_MASK |
01580             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK |
01581             gtk.gdk.ENTER_NOTIFY_MASK |
01582             gtk.gdk.LEAVE_NOTIFY_MASK |
01583             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_MASK)
01584 
01585         gtk.gdk.keyboard_grab(
01586             d.window,
01587             owner_events=True)
01588 
01589         self.handlePopUp()
01590 
01591         self.handleItemChanged()
01592 
01593 
01594     def popDown(self):
01595 
01596         self.d.grab_remove()
01597 
01598         print "POINTER_UNGRAB"
01599         gtk.gdk.pointer_ungrab()
01600 
01601         self.hide()
01602        
01603         self.handlePopDown()
01604 
01605         curItem = self.curItem
01606         if curItem != -1:
01607             item = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01608             item.handleLolite()
01609 
01610         self.curItem = -1
01611         self.curRingIndex = 0
01612         self.item = None
01613 
01614         # TODO: restore focus?
01615 
01616 
01617     def handleExpose(self, widget, event):
01618 
01619         self.draw(widget, event)
01620 
01621         return False
01622 
01623 
01624     def draw(self, widget, event):
01625 
01626         context = widget.window.cairo_create()
01627         pcontext = widget.create_pango_context()
01628         playout = pango.Layout(pcontext)
01629 
01630         self.setWindowShape()
01631 
01632         self.validate(context, pcontext, playout)
01633 
01634         context.rectangle(
01635             event.area.x,
01636             event.area.y,
01637             event.area.width,
01638             event.area.height)
01639         context.clip()
01640 
01641         self.drawBackground(context, pcontext, playout)
01642 
01643         self.drawHeader(context, pcontext, playout)
01644         self.drawFooter(context, pcontext, playout)
01645 
01646         curItem = self.curItem
01647         if curItem != -1:
01648             curItemObj = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01649         else:
01650             curItemObj = None
01651 
01652         curRingIndex = self.curRingIndex
01653         drawItemLater = None
01654 
01655         for item in self.items[::-1]:
01656             if item.index == curItem:
01657                 drawItemLater = item
01658             else:
01659                 # Deal with pie items specially.
01660                 if not item.linear:
01661 
01662                     # Don't draw pie labels inside of current ring.
01663                     if item.ringIndex < curRingIndex:
01664                         continue
01665 
01666                     # Draw pie labels outside of current ring transparently.
01667                     # Oops, we can't just set the opacity in the graphics state,
01668                     # so we would have to pass it into item.draw, but not yet. 
01669                     if item.ringIndex > curRingIndex:
01670                         opacity = 0.5
01671 
01672                 item.draw(context, pcontext, playout)
01673 
01674         # Draw the current item last so it overlaps all other items.
01675         if drawItemLater:
01676             drawItemLater.draw(context, pcontext, playout)
01677 
01678         self.drawOverlay(context, pcontext, playout)
01679 
01680 
01681     def drawBackground(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01682 
01683         centerX = self.centerX
01684         centerY = self.centerY
01685 
01686         context.rectangle(
01687             0,
01688             0,
01689             self.winWidth,
01690             self.winHeight)
01691         context.clip()
01692 
01693         fillColor = self.outsideFillColor
01694        
01695         if fillColor:
01696             context.rectangle(
01697                 0,
01698                 0,
01699                 self.winWidth,
01700                 self.winHeight)
01701 
01702             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01703             context.fill()
01704 
01705         curItem = self.curItem
01706         if curItem != -1:
01707             curItemObj = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01708         else:
01709             curItemObj = None
01710 
01711         curRingIndex = self.curRingIndex
01712         pieRings = self.pieRings
01713         ringRadius = self.ringRadius
01714         neutralRadius = self.neutralRadius
01715         radius = self.radius
01716 
01717         if pieRings and radius:
01718 
01719             fillColor = self.backgroundFillColor
01720             strokeColor = self.backgroundStrokeColor
01721             edgeStrokeColor = self.edgeStrokeColor
01722 
01723             for ringIndex in range(len(pieRings) - 1, -1, -1):
01724                 ringItems = pieRings[ringIndex]
01725 
01726                 ########################################################################
01727                 # Draw the ring.
01728 
01729                 if ringIndex == 0:
01730                     innerRadius  = neutralRadius
01731                     outerRadius = radius
01732                 else:
01733                     innerRadius = radius + ((ringIndex - 1) * ringRadius)
01734                     outerRadius = radius + ((ringIndex) * ringRadius)
01735 
01736                 opacity = 1.0
01737                 if (ringIndex > curRingIndex):
01738                     opacity = 0.5
01739 
01740                 if ringIndex != curRingIndex:
01741 
01742                     # Don't draw rings inside the current ring.
01743                     if ringIndex < (curRingIndex - 1):
01744                         continue
01745 
01746                     if strokeColor:
01747 
01748                         context.arc(
01749                             centerX,
01750                             centerY,
01751                             radius + (ringIndex * ringRadius),
01752                             0,
01753                             TwoPI)
01754 
01755                         #strokeColorAlpha = strokeColor + (opacity,)
01756                         #context.set_source_rgba(*strokeColorAlpha)
01757                         context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01758                         context.stroke()
01759 
01760                 ########################################################################
01761                 # Draw a circle around the radius.
01762 
01763                 if fillColor or strokeColor or edgeStrokeColor:
01764 
01765                     if fillColor:
01766 
01767                         context.arc(
01768                             centerX,
01769                             centerY,
01770                             outerRadius,
01771                             0,
01772                             TwoPI)
01773 
01774                         #fillColorAlpha = fillColor + (opacity,)
01775                         #context.set_source_rgba(*fillColorAlpha)
01776                         context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01777                         context.fill()
01778 
01779                     if (edgeStrokeColor and
01780                         (len(ringItems) > 1)):
01781 
01782                         for item in ringItems:
01783 
01784                             edge1Dx = item.edge1Dx
01785                             edge1Dy = item.edge1Dy
01786 
01787                             context.move_to(
01788                                 centerX + (edge1Dx * neutralRadius),
01789                                 centerY + (edge1Dy * neutralRadius))
01790                             context.line_to(
01791                                 centerX + (edge1Dx * outerRadius),
01792                                 centerY + (edge1Dy * outerRadius))
01793 
01794                         # If the pie is sliced, and it's not a whole
01795                         # pie, then draw the last trailing edge.
01796 
01797                         pieSlice = self.pieSlice
01798                         if (pieSlice > 0) and (pieSlice < 1):
01799                             item = ringItems[-1]
01800 
01801                             edge2Dx = item.edge2Dx
01802                             edge2Dy = item.edge2Dy
01803 
01804                             context.move_to(
01805                                 centerX + (edge2Dx * neutralRadius),
01806                                 centerY + (edge2Dy * neutralRadius))
01807                             context.line_to(
01808                                 centerX + (edge2Dx * outerRadius),
01809                                 centerY + (edge2Dy * outerRadius))
01810 
01811                         #edgeStrokeColorAlpha = edgeStrokeColor + (opacity,)
01812                         #context.set_source_rgba(*edgeStrokeColorAlpha)
01813                         context.set_source_rgb(*edgeStrokeColor)
01814                         context.stroke()
01815 
01816                     if strokeColor:
01817 
01818                         context.arc(
01819                             centerX,
01820                             centerY,
01821                             outerRadius,
01822                             0,
01823                             TwoPI)
01824 
01825                         #strokeColorAlpha = strokeColor + (opacity,)
01826                         #context.set_source_rgba(*strokeColorAlpha)
01827                         context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01828                         context.stroke()
01829 
01830 
01831             ########################################################################
01832             # Draw a circle around the neutralRadius,
01833             # and hilite if no item selected.
01834 
01835             if curItem == -1:
01836                 fillColor = self.neutralHiliteFillColor
01837                 strokeColor = self.neutralHiliteStrokeColor
01838             else:
01839                 fillColor = self.neutralLoliteFillColor
01840                 strokeColor = self.neutralLoliteStrokeColor
01841 
01842             if fillColor or strokeColor:
01843 
01844                 if fillColor:
01845                     context.arc(
01846                         centerX,
01847                         centerY,
01848                         neutralRadius,
01849                         0,
01850                         TwoPI)
01851 
01852                     context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01853                     if strokeColor:
01854                         context.fill_preserve()
01855                     else:
01856                         context.fill()
01857 
01858                 if strokeColor:
01859                     context.arc(
01860                         centerX,
01861                         centerY,
01862                         neutralRadius,
01863                         0,
01864                         TwoPI)
01865 
01866                     context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01867                     context.stroke()
01868 
01869 
01870             ########################################################################
01871             # Draw the hilited slice.
01872            
01873             sliceHiliteFillColor = self.sliceHiliteFillColor
01874             sliceHiliteStrokeColor = self.sliceHiliteStrokeColor
01875 
01876             if ((sliceHiliteFillColor or sliceHiliteStrokeColor) and
01877                 curItemObj):
01878 
01879                 if curItemObj.linear:
01880                     pass # TODO: hilite linear items
01881                 else:
01882                     edge1Angle = curItemObj.edge1Angle
01883                     edge2Angle = curItemObj.edge2Angle
01884 
01885                     ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(curRingIndex)
01886 
01887                     if not ringClockwise:
01888                         temp = edge1Angle
01889                         edge1ang = edge2Angle
01890                         edge2ang = temp
01891 
01892                     # If outer ring, then extend highlight to screen edge.
01893                     if len(pieRings) == 1:
01894                         innerRadius = self.neutralRadius
01895                         outerRadius = self.radius + self.popoutRadius
01896                     else:
01897                         if curRingIndex == 0:
01898                             innerRadius = self.neutralRadius
01899                             outerRadius = self.radius
01900                         else:
01901                             innerRadius = self.radius + (ringRadius * (curRingIndex - 1))
01902                             outerRadius = self.radius + (ringRadius * curRingIndex)
01903                             if curRingIndex == (len(pieRings) - 1):
01904                                 outerRadius += self.popoutRadius
01905 
01906                     context.arc(
01907                         centerX,
01908                         centerY,
01909                         outerRadius,
01910                         edge1Angle,
01911                         edge2Angle)
01912 
01913                     context.arc_negative(
01914                         centerX,
01915                         centerY,
01916                         innerRadius,
01917                         edge2Angle,
01918                         edge1Angle)
01919 
01920                     context.close_path()
01921 
01922                 if fillColor:
01923                     context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteFillColor)
01924                     #context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteFillColor + (0.5,))
01925                     if strokeColor:
01926                         context.fill_preserve()
01927                     else:
01928                         context.fill()
01929 
01930                 if strokeColor:
01931                     context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteStrokeColor)
01932                     #context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteStrokeColor + (0.5,))
01933                     context.stroke()
01934 
01935 
01936     def drawHeader(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01937 
01938         header = self.header
01939 
01940         if header == None:
01941             return
01942 
01943         x = self.headerX
01944         y = self.headerY
01945         width = self.headerWidth
01946         height = self.headerHeight
01947 
01948         context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01949 
01950         fillColor = self.headerFillColor
01951        
01952         if fillColor:
01953             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01954 
01955             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01956             context.fill()
01957 
01958         strokeColor = self.headerStrokeColor
01959        
01960         if strokeColor:
01961             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01962 
01963             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01964             context.stroke()
01965 
01966         textColor = self.headerTextColor
01967 
01968         if textColor:
01969 
01970             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
01971 
01972             font = GetFont(self.headerFont)
01973 
01974             playout.set_font_description(font)
01975             playout.set_markup(header)
01976 
01977             headerPadding = self.headerPadding
01978 
01979             context.move_to(
01980                 x + headerPadding,
01981                 y + headerPadding)
01982 
01983             context.show_layout(playout)
01984

01994         y = self.footerY
01995         width = self.footerWidth
01996         height = self.footerHeight
01997 
01998         context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01999 
02000         fillColor = self.footerFillColor
02001        
02002         if fillColor:
02003             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
02004 
02005             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
02006             context.fill()
02007 
02008         strokeColor = self.footerStrokeColor
02009        
02010         if strokeColor:
02011             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
02012 
02013             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
02014             context.stroke()
02015 
02016         textColor = self.footerTextColor
02017 
02018         if textColor:
02019 
02020             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
02021 
02022             font = GetFont(self.footerFont)
02023 
02024             playout.set_font_description(font)
02025             playout.set_markup(footer)
02026 
02027             footerPadding = self.footerPadding
02028 
02029             context.move_to(
02030                 x + footerPadding,
02031                 y + footerPadding)
02032

02036     def drawOverlay(self, context, pcontext, playout):

02039        
02040         if strokeColor:
02041             context.rectangle(
02042                 0,
02043                 0,
02044                 self.winWidth,
02045                 self.winHeight)
02046 
02047             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
02048             context.stroke()

02054 
02055     def redraw(self):
02056         self.d.queue_draw()
02057 
02058 
02059     def trackMouseMove(self, cx, cy):
02060 
02061         curX = self.curX
02062         curY = self.curY
02063 
02064         if ((cx == curX) and
02065             (cy == curY)):
02066             return
02067        
02068         self.lastX = curX
02069         self.lastY = curY
02070         self.curX = cx
02071         self.curY = cy
02072 
02073         # Track the selection based on the cursor offset from the menu center.
02074 
02075         dx = cx - self.centerX
02076         dy = cy - self.centerY
02077 
02078         # Add in and clear out any virtual mouse motion.
02079         dx += self.mouseDeltaX
02080         dy += self.mouseDeltaY
02081         self.mouseDeltaX = 0
02082         self.mouseDeltaY = 0
02083 
02084         self.dx = dx
02085         self.dy = dy
02086 
02087         self.distance = (
02088             Sqrt(
02089                 (dx * dx) +
02090                 (dy * dy)))
02091 
02092         if self.distance <= 0:
02093             self.direction = 0
02094         else:
02095             self.direction = NormalizeAngleRad(Atan2(-dy, dx))
02096 
02097         visibleItems = self.visibleItems
02098         itemCount = len(visibleItems)
02099 
02100         self.handleMotion()
02101 
02102         # If there aren't any items, there's nothing to do.
02103         if itemCount == 0:
02104             return
02105 
02106         newItem = -1
02107         lastItem = self.curItem
02108 
02109         self.lastItem = lastItem
02110 
02111         #print "trackMouseMove", "cx", cx, "cy", cy, "dx", dx, "dy", dy
02112 
02113         pieRings = self.pieRings
02114 
02115         curRingIndex = (
02116             max(0,
02117                 min(len(pieRings) - 1,
02118                     Floor(
02119                         (self.distance - self.radius) /
02120                         self.ringRadius) + 1)))
02121 
02122         self.curRingIndex = curRingIndex
02123         curItemEntered = -1
02124 
02125         for i in range(0, itemCount):
02126             it = self.items[i]
02127 
02128             # Ignore the item if
02129             # there is more than one ring,
02130             # the item is a pie item,
02131             # and it's not in the currently selected ring.
02132             if ((len(pieRings) > 1) and
02133                 (not it.linear) and
02134                 (it.ringIndex != curRingIndex)):
02135                 continue
02136 
02137             x0 = it.finalX
02138             y0 = it.finalY
02139             x1 = x0 + it.width
02140             y1 = y0 + it.height
02141             #print "trackMouseMove ITEM", "i", i, "cx", cx, "cy", cy, "x0", x0, "y0", y0, "x1", x1, "y1", y1
02142 
02143             if ((cx >= x0) and (cx < x1) and
02144                 (cy >= y0) and (cy < y1)):
02145                 #print "ENTERED", i
02146                 curItemEntered = i
02147                 break
02148 
02149         if curItemEntered != -1:
02150             newItem = curItemEntered
02151         else:
02152             if (pieRings and
02153                 (self.distance > self.neutralRadius)):
02154 
02155                 ringItems = pieRings[curRingIndex]
02156                 ringItemCount = len(ringItems)
02157 
02158                 pieSlice = self.pieSlice
02159                 pieSubtend = TwoPI
02160                 if pieSlice > 0:
02161                     pieSubtend *= pieSlice
02162 
02163                 if ringItemCount == 1:
02164                     newItem = ringItems[0].index
02165                 else:
02166 
02167                     if ringItemCount > 0:
02168                         ringInitialAngle = self.getRingInitialAngle(curRingIndex)
02169                         ang = DegToRad(ringInitialAngle)
02170 
02171                         ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(curRingIndex)
02172 
02173                         if pieSlice == 0:
02174                             twist = pieSubtend / ringItemCount / 2.0
02175                         else:
02176                             twist = 0
02177 
02178                         if ringClockwise:
02179                             ang = ang - self.direction + twist
02180                         else:
02181                             ang = ang + self.direction - twist
02182 
02183                         ang = NormalizeAngleRad(ang)
02184 
02185                         newPieItem = Floor((ang / pieSubtend) * ringItemCount)
02186 
02187                         if newPieItem < 0:
02188                             newPieItem = -1
02189                         elif newPieItem >= ringItemCount:
02190                             newPieItem = -1
02191 
02192                         if newPieItem == -1:
02193                             newItem = -1
02194                         else:
02195                             newItem = ringItems[newPieItem].index
02196 
02197         # Now we've figured out the selected newItem,
02198         # so update the display if necessary.
02199 
02200         if newItem >= len(self.visibleItems):
02201             newItem = itemCount - 1
02202 
02203         if newItem != lastItem:
02204             self.curItem = newItem
02205 
02206             item = None
02207             for i in range(0, itemCount):
02208                 it = self.items[i]
02209                 hilited = (i == newItem)
02210                 if hilited:
02211                     item = it
02212                     break
02213             self.item = item
02214 
02215             if self.footerDescriptions:
02216                 footer = None
02217                 if item == None:
02218                     footer = self.neutralDescription
02219                 else:
02220                     footer = item.description
02221                 self.setFooter(footer)
02222 
02223             now = time.time()
02224 
02225             if lastItem != -1:
02226                 it = self.items[lastItem]
02227                 if it.enterTime == 0:
02228                     it.enterTime = now
02229                 it.exitTime = now
02230                 elapsed = now - it.enterTime
02231                 it.totalTime += elapsed
02232                 it.handleLolite()
02233 
02234             if newItem != -1:
02235                 it = self.items[newItem]
02236                 it.enterTime = now
02237                 it.handleHilite()
02238 
02239             self.redraw()
02240 
02241             self.handleItemChanged()
02242 
02243         if newItem != -1:
02244             item = self.items[newItem]
02245             item.handleMotion()
02246 
02247 
02248     def handleMotion(self):
02249 
02250         # TODO: notify menu about mouse motion
02251         #print "handleMotion", self, "curItem", self.curItem, "distance", self.distance, "direction", self.direction
02252         pass
02253 
02254 
02255     def handleItemChanged(self):
02256 
02257         # TODO: notify menu that item changed
02258         #print "handleItemChanged", self, "curItem", self.curItem
02259         pass
02260 
02261 
02262     def handlePopUp(self):
02263 
02264         # TODO: notify menu that current item changed
02265         #print "handlePopUp", self
02266         pass
02267 
02268 
02269     def handlePopDown(self):
02270 
02271         # TODO: notify menu that current item changed
02272         #print "handlePopDown", self
02273         pass
02274 
02275 
02276     def handleAction(self):
02277 
02278         # TODO: notify menu that item was selected
02279         #print "handleAction", self, "curItem", self.curItem
02280 
02281         if self.action:
02282             self.action(self)
02283 
02284 
02285     def handleCancel(self):
02286 
02287         # TODO: notify menu that menu was canceled
02288         #print "handleCancel", self
02289         pass
02290 
02291 
02292     def handleSubmenu(self):
02293 
02294         # TODO: notify menu that submenu was popped up
02295         #print "handleSubmenu", self
02296         pass
02297 
02298 
02299     def trackMouseDown(self):
02300 
02301         pass
02302 
02303 
02304     def trackMouseUp(self):
02305 
02306         if ((self.curItem == -1) and
02307             (not self.pinned)):
02308             self.pinned = True
02309             return
02310 
02311         self.doAction()
02312         self.popDown()
02313 
02314 
02315     def doAction(self):
02316 
02317         curItem = self.curItem
02318         if curItem == -1:
02319             self.handleCancel()
02320             return
02321 
02322         item = self.visibleItems[curItem]
02323        
02324         #print "DOACTION", self, self.curItem, item, item.label
02325 
02326         subPie = item.subPie
02327         if subPie:
02328             x = self.curX + self.x
02329             y = self.curY + self.y
02330             subPie.popUp(x, y, True)
02331             self.handleSubmenu()
02332         else:
02333             self.handleAction()
02334             item.handleAction()
02335 
02336 
02337     def handleShow(self, widget):
02338 
02339         print "handleShow", self, widget
02340         pass
02341 
02342 
02343     def handleSizeAllocate(self, widget, rect):
02344 
02345         self.d.queue_draw()
02346 
02347 
02348     def handleMotionNotifyEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02349         #print "handleMotionNotifyEvent", self, widget, event, args
02350 
02351         if (hasattr(event, 'is_hint') and
02352             event.is_hint):
02353             x, y, state = event.window.get_pointer()
02354         else:
02355             x = event.x
02356             y = event.y
02357             state = event.state
02358 
02359         self.trackMouseMove(x, y)
02360 
02361 
02362     def handleButtonPressEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02363         print "handleButtonPressEvent", self, widget, event, args
02364         self.handleMotionNotifyEvent(widget, event, *args)
02365         self.trackMouseDown()
02366 
02367 
02368     def handleButtonReleaseEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02369         print "handleButtonReleaseEvent", self, widget, event, args
02370         self.handleMotionNotifyEvent(widget, event, *args)
02371         self.trackMouseUp()
02372 
02373 
02374     def handleProximityInEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02375         #print "handleProximityInEvent", self, widget, event, args
02376         self.handleMotionNotifyEvent(widget, event, *args)
02377 
02378 
02379     def handleProximityOutEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02380         #print "handleProximityOutEvent", self, widget, event, args
02381         self.handleMotionNotifyEvent(widget, event, *args)
02382 
02383 
02384     def handleGrabNotify(self, widget, event, *args):
02385         print "handleGrabNotify", self, widget, event, args
02386         pass
02387 
02388 
02389     def handleGrabBrokenEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02390         print "handleGrabBrokenEvent", self, widget, event, args
02391         self.popDown()
02392 
02393 
02394     def handleKeyPressEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02395         #print "handleKeyPressEvent", self, widget, event, args
02396         #print help(event)
02397         pass
02398 
02399 
02400     def handleKeyReleaseEvent(self, widget, event, *args):
02401         #print "handleKeyReleaseEvent", self, widget, event, args
02402         pass
